LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.label: arachnic acid solution
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.description: An acid sac-wielding Arachnidae sprayed strong acid at the target. The liquid that adhered to it was painful, softened the armor and skin, and continued to burn the body.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.0.label: Mild
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.1.label: Mild
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.2.label: Moderate
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.3.label: severe
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.5.label: complete
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.label: arachne neurotoxin
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.description: Neurotoxins from the Arachne stinger are acting on this colonist. This powerful toxin can rapidly incapacitate people, cause nausea and dizziness, and in some cases cause permanent brain damage.
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.2.label: Mild
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.3.label: Moderate
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.4.label: severe
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.ARA_SkyhiveBite.label: Tensu species attached
LanguageData.ARA_SkyhiveBite.description: A cute Arachne insect has bitten you.The insect will continue biting until it leaves your body.It shouldn't be a big problem.
LanguageData.ARA_ReinforceGasCoverd.label: Arachne information element attachment
LanguageData.ARA_ReinforceGasCoverd.description: You have touched the Arachne information element. Something is coming from underground.
LanguageData.ARA_Unburnable.label: fireproof fume
LanguageData.ARA_Unburnable.description: This area is covered with a special smoke, and settlers inside the smoke will not easily ignite.
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.label: chain loading
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.description: The weapons you use can be chain loaded, and the reload speed increases with each shot.
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.0.label: level 1/5
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.1.label: level 2/5
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.2.label: level 3/5
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.3.label: Level 4/5
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.4.label: Level 5/5
LanguageData.ARA_BeamAiming.label: beam preheating
LanguageData.ARA_BeamAiming.description: The Arachne Bug's beam-based energy weapon can continue firing continuously after aiming for a short period of time.
LanguageData.ARA_BeamAiming.stages.0.label: Completion
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Execution_Damage.label: execution
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Execution_Damage.description: Deals heavy damage to execute the target.
LanguageData.ARA_Whip_Hediff.label: whipping
LanguageData.ARA_Whip_Hediff.description: This settler was struck by the soft weapon of the Arachnebug--very painfully.
LanguageData.ARA_Hediff_FrostCoverd_after.label: frost coating
LanguageData.ARA_Hediff_FrostCoverd_after.description: This person is covered in a cloud of ice and frost, and will soon cause a frost fog explosion.
LanguageData.ARA_CryoShock.label: rapid cooling
LanguageData.ARA_CryoShock.description: Subject is in a state of rapid freezing. This state renders the body's structures extremely fragile. As the effect progresses, body parts may be directly destroyed by cryodamage.
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_ExtractGene_Hediff.label: Forced peeling
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_ExtractGene_Hediff.descr: The Arachne variant has forcibly extracted some genetic sequences from this colonist. As a result, the colonist is no longer able to maintain basic physiological activities. This damage is irreversible and cannot be reversed even if the genes are returned.
LanguageData.ARA_Dissolver_Touch_Damage.label: Solvent acid
LanguageData.ARA_Dissolver_Touch_Damage.description: The Arachne-lipospecies has showered this subject with a large amount of liquefied acid, and its body will soon turn into a jelly-like honey can.\n\nHow pathetic.
